title: Find the LCD of the Fractions
speech: LCD of  fraction, y over, y plus 8,  , , fraction, 128 over, y squared minus 64,  ,  9  is  parentheses y plus 8,  times, parentheses y minus 8,

title: Clear All Fractions
text: We must multiply each fraction by the LCD. We get $$y(y-8)=128+9\left(y^2-64\right)$$.
speech: We must multiply each fraction by the LCD. We get  y, parentheses y minus 8,  is equal to 128 plus 9 times, parentheses, y squared minus 64,  .

title: Simplify the Equation
text: Let's simplify this equation: $$y^2-8y=128+9y^2-576$$. This simplifies to $$8y^2+8y-448=0$$. $$y^2+y-56=0$$
speech: Let's simplify this equation:  y squared minus 8 y is equal to 128 plus 9 y squared, minus, 576 . This simplifies to  8 y squared plus 8 y minus 448 is equal to, 0 .  y squared, plus y minus 56 is equal to 0

. This simplifies to   8 y squared plus 8 y minus 448 is equal to, 0
.   y squared, plus y minus 56 is equal to 0

title: Solve the Equation
text: Let's factor to solve. $$\left(y+8\right) \left(y-7\right)=0$$. $$y=-8$$ is not a solution since it is in the denominator. $$y=7$$ is a solution.
